bibl.title: Demaenetus and the Trireme.
bibl.note: Explores what Demaenetus's stealing a trireme from the Piraeus to join up with the Persian navy (led by the exiled Athenian commander Conon) might have meant, and why the Oxyrhynchus historian includes it while Xenophon does not. - Avec résumés en anglais et en français.
bibl.seg: Kathryn Simonsen, Demaenetus and the Trireme.
Catherine Rubincam (ed.), Hellenica Oxyrhynchia after 100 Years = Mouseion (Canada) 9 (2009) pp. 283-302, 1 tabl.

Explores what Demaenetus's stealing a trireme from the Piraeus to join up with the Persian navy (led by the exiled Athenian commander Conon) might have meant, and why the Oxyrhynchus historian includes it while Xenophon does not. - Avec résumés en anglais et en français.
